attendance_locked: This event has been locked; attendance can no longer be changed.
start_greeting: Hello please use the commands to talk to me
start_training_bot: Hello! I am the training bot. Use /attendance to mark your attendance.
cancel_basic: Process cancelled, see you next time!
cancel_detailed: Operation cancelled. See you next time!
event_not_found_retry: Event not found. Please try again.
registration_select_gender: Let's get you registered. What's your gender?
registration_name_conflict: That name is already registered. Please use a different name.
registration_confirm_name: Confirm your name (please provide your identifiable full name): {name}
registration_prompt_telegram_user: You haven't set a Telegram @username yet. Go to your telegram settings to set it and then send it here as a reply.
If you want to set it later, tap skip to continue (you can run /register or /start again to update).
We highly encourage setting a username so core members can reach you.
registration_invalid_telegram_username: Please provide a valid Telegram username (without @).
registration_handle_updated: Thanks! We've updated your Telegram username in our records.
registration_submitted: Thanks {name}! Your registration has been submitted.
manage_event_choose_event: Select an event to manage or create a new one.
manage_event_no_events: No upcoming events found. Create a new one to get started.
manage_event_prompt_start_datetime: Pick a start date/time for the new event.
If the calendar picker is not available, send it in YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM (24h).
You can also tap below to use the current time.
manage_event_invalid_datetime: Please send the datetime in this format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM (24h).
manage_event_new_event_created: New event created for {start}. Configure the details below.
manage_event_choose_title: Choose a title preset or pick Custom to type your own.
manage_event_custom_title_prompt: Send the custom title for this event.
manage_event_prompt_description: Send the new description for this event.
manage_event_prompt_start_input: Send the new start time in YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM (24h).
manage_event_prompt_end_input: Send the new end time in YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM (24h).
manage_event_prompt_deadline_input: Send the new attendance deadline in YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM (24h).
